translated: The bat spectrum or false vampire (scientific name: Vampyrum spectrum) is the biggest bat of America, and the largest carnivorous bats (that is to say, not insectivore) World .
original: La chauve-souris spectre, ou faux-vampire (nom scientifique : Vampyrum spectrum) est la plus grande chauve-souris d'Amérique, et la plus grande chauve-souris carnivore (c'est-à-dire, non insectivore) du monde.
